|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 04:F0:21
|chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA6391; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax |802.11ax = 1201 |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2020 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6391 (''Hastings'') • NGFF Wi-Fi 6 Radio Module *M.2 E Key interface with PCIe 2.0, HCI UART Bluetooth Host Interface *2x spatial streams (2SS) Multi-User MIMO (MU-MIMO) *Frequency Range:2.412~2.483GHz, 5.150~5.850GHz *Data Rate: 573.6Mbps at 2.4GHz, 1201Mbps at 5GHz *2.4GHz max 16dBm output power (per chain) *5GHz max 15dBm output power (per chain)
==See also== :;[[Compex]] • [https://compex.com.sg/wifi-module/ Wi-Fi Module] *[[Compex WSD377]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377 *[[Compex WLT639]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6391 *[[Compex WLT674]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174
